title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic AI Solutions for Financial Services & Insurance with AWS (PEX301)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 面向金融服务与保险行业的智能体AI解决方案 (PEX301)
abstract: Join us for an exciting deep dive into cutting-edge AI solutions for financial services and insurance Partners using AWS technologies! Discover how to harness Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and Strands SDK to enhance customer experiences. Learn to build intelligent underwriting assistant for insurance and explore diverse use cases in Financial Services. Recommended for teams looking to strengthen their AI capabilities in financial services.
abstract_cn: 加入我们，深入探讨面向金融服务和保险合作伙伴的前沿AI解决方案，使用AWS技术！了解如何利用Amazon Bedrock AgentCore和Strands SDK来增强客户体验。学习构建智能保险核保助手，探索金融服务领域的多样化用例。推荐给希望加强金融服务AI能力的团队。

presenter.name: Ayan Ray
presenter.title: GenAI Tech Lead, Infra ISV Partners
